name: Indiana Jones and the temple of Holy Crap moments
name_original: Indiana Jones and the temple of Holy Crap moments
description:
Indiana Jones and the temple of Holy Crap moments is an action, adventure and platformer game developed by MoldyToeMan. It came out on 14-04-2021.
You can play Indiana Jones and the temple of Holy Crap moments on Web. You can purchase the game on itch.io.
